resources.string: McGill Version \nHelps you find balance in life
Enter the hours of \nsleep you desire
Enter the hours of \nschooling you desire
Enter the hours of socializing you desire

In the end, life is not about trying to do as many things as possible in the shortest period of time. It\'s about finding the right balance. You might only be able to choose 2 out of the 3 staples of college student life, and that\'s fine. Or you may have to do the energy to do all 3, and that\'s fine too. Don\'t let the media or us tell you what to do.
